title: Mediterranean Pasta
description: Spaghetti noodles with seafood and spices, a specialty of the cuisine. Warning: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: Lo Mein Noodles
description: Slippery Lo Mein Noodles tossed in a Lo Mein Sauce with tons of veggies and protein of your choice

title: Macaroni Chili
description: Fettuccine Pasta with Chili Sauce and Spices.

title: Grilled-Salmon Salad
description: House salad (lettuce, arugula, carrots) with salmon.

title: Steak with potatoes
description: Beef steak (150g) on ​​the grill, with fries. With rice and sauces.

title: Chopped picanha with vegetables and pasta
description: Chopped picanha, with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

title: Vegan lasagna
description: 100% vegan lasagna made with soy meat and special pasta.

title: Special salad
description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas and more.

title: Meatballs
description: Portion of meatballs with sour cream, onion and seasonings. Served with rice or pasta.
